mapper.insert: insert into orders (orderID, postPName, postPTel, postPAddr, getPName, getPTel, getPAddr, goodsName, goodsWeight, orderType, orderState, transportPrice, deliceryPrice, totalPrice, Comment ) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliceryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update orders set postPName = #{postpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPTel = #{postptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPAddr = #{postpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPName = #{getpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPTel = #{getptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPAddr = #{getpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsWeight = #{goodsweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderType = #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderState = #{orderstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportPrice = #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deliceryPrice = #{deliceryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select orderID, postPName, postPTel, postPAddr, getPName, getPTel, getPAddr, goodsName, goodsWeight, orderType, orderState, transportPrice, deliceryPrice, totalPrice, Comment from orders where orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select orderID, postPName, postPTel, postPAddr, getPName, getPTel, getPAddr, goodsName, goodsWeight, orderType, orderState, transportPrice, deliceryPrice, totalPrice, Comment from orders
